examples: The universal language of art is bridging a divide.
Good wine can make a meal.
Memories of that day still bring a lump to his throat.
The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
My vegetarian friend enjoyed a nourishing adzuki bean grain bowl for lunch.
words.defineEn: used when we want to talk about a person or thing for the first time or when other people may not know who or what they are
words.defineVi: được sử dụng khi chúng ta muốn nói về một người hoặc vật lần đầu tiên hoặc khi những người khác có thể không biết họ là ai hoặc cái gì

examples: A hundred cents make one euro.
Hundreds of people came to hear her speak.
Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
There are hundreds of prizes up for grabs.
The cliff dropped down over a hundred feet to the sea below.
words.defineEn: the number 100; the number of years in a century
words.defineVi: số 100; số năm trong một thế kỷ

examples: The diamond thief double-crossed his partners and gave them only worthless fake jewels.
My mom stuffs pimientos with cream cheese and serves them as an appetizer at parties.
"And pigs can fly!"
I discovered the delightful combination of pawpaw and coconut in a tropical fruit salad.
The child jumped up and down with excitement.
words.defineEn: used to connect two words, phrases, or sentences referring to related things
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để kết nối hai từ, cụm từ hoặc câu đề cập đến những điều liên quan

examples: Our cat has just had five kittens.
He did five years for manslaughter.
I gave it five out of ten.
Williams broke her opponent's serve five times.
Five pounds doesn't buy much nowadays.
words.defineEn: the number 5; the number of fingers we have on one hand
words.defineVi: số 5; số ngón tay chúng ta có trên một bàn tay

words.defineEn: referring to the numerical value that represents the result of multiplying two by one hundred
words.defineVi: đề cập đến giá trị số biểu thị kết quả của phép nhân hai với một trăm

words.defineEn: referring to the numerical value that represents the quantity or value obtained by multiplying three by one hundred
words.defineVi: đề cập đến giá trị số đại diện cho số lượng hoặc giá trị thu được bằng cách nhân ba với một trăm

examples: Fifty thousand people saw the match.
Almost fifty years have passed since that day.
I can count up to fifty in English.
The house is set in fifty acres of parkland.
Tom may be only forty-five, but with his gray hair and wrinkles, he appears to be on the other side of fifty.
words.defineEn: the number 50; the number of fingers on five monkeys
words.defineVi: con số 50; số ngón tay của năm con khỉ

words.defineEn: the number 75; the number of legs on seven crabs plus five
words.defineVi: con số 75; số chân của bảy con cua cộng với năm

examples: The discovery of gold brought thousands of people to the Transvaal.
Cancer kills thousands of people every year.
A cure for lung cancer would save thousands of lives each year.
Government investment has brought thousands of new jobs to the area.
That one mistake left him thousands of pounds out of pocket.
words.defineEn: the number 1000; the number of meters in one kilometer
words.defineVi: số 1000; số mét trong một km

examples: Their last album sold millions.
Her last book sold millions of copies.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
The disease wiped out 40 million rabbits at a stroke.
Her work has given pleasure to millions of readers.
